long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you like Klondike and Spider Solitaire but want something new, you’ll love Scorpion Solitaire!
Choose from three difficulty levels (easy, medium or hard) and complete solitaire in as few moves as possible.

INTRODUCTION
Play Scorpion Solitaire on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!
Multilanguage The game runs in English, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Portuguese and German. If the player’s browser runs in one of the languages supported, the game will be automatically translated. If not, it will run in English by default.

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Scorpion Solitaire extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Scorpion Solitaire icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Scorpion Solitaire popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
See on the game
